CustomField.description: Picklist to track status of account. Customer - account has been shutdown, archived, etc. Supplier/Vendor - account is no longer an existing vendor/supplier for Welco
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Active - existing customer or current supplier/vendor. In Review - currently review supplier/vendor relationship. Inactive - customer facility has shut down; no longer a current supplier/vendor
CustomField.label: Account Status
